data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Button,
        Card,
        ContextButton,
        Overlay,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Button for="overlay-loading" palette="accent">
    Open LAZY Modal
</Button>

<Overlay logic_id="overlay-loading" loading="lazy">
    <Card.Container palette="auto" max_width="75">
        <Card.Header>LAZY Modal</Card.Header>

        <Card.Footer>
            <ContextButton
                palette="inverse"
                variation="clear"
            >
                Close
            </ContextButton>
        </Card.Footer>
    </Card.Container>
</Overlay>
data.title: Overlay Loading
